title: Cross-Cultural Communication-Based Instructional Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific knowledge and ability to use digital devices (smartphones)
context.additional_context: A project analyzing DIY protective mask-making manuals from a cross-cultural perspective during the COVID-19 pandemic

learning_goals: Compare and analyze DIY mask-making manuals from four countries (France, India, Spain, and the USA) from an intercultural communication perspective
Identify culture-specific language choices, image usage, and persuasion strategies and evaluate them based on scientific evidence
Propose effective instructional design solutions that reflect intercultural strengths based on analysis results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
